…d non-registering version.
From https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-java/blob/master/docs/sdk-configuration.md#configuring-an-instance-of-the-sdk - this is to reduce the magic of a build method affecting the global.
Sending as draft for now since want to merge #2386 first

commit.message: Rename OpenTelemetrySdkBuilder.build to buildAndRegisterGlobal and add non-registering version.

nodes.bodyText: I still think that just calling this build() would be fine. If you're looking at your auto-complete options, it should be obvious that the one that has AndRegisterGlobal() on the end of it would do what it says, and, hence, this one wouldn't.
